channel.title: Git on Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in Git on Notebook

item.description: Branches # git remote rm origin git remote add origin https://xxxx/xxxx git push origin --all New branch: git checkout -b <branch> git push -u origin <branch> Merge: git checkout master git merge hotfix List tags: git fetch --tags git push --tags

Configuration of git # Username and email # git config --global user.name "D. Purge" git config --global user.email "my@email.com" SSH checkouts from Azure DevOps # Generate SSH keypair: ssh-keygen -t rsa Full parameters: ssh-keygen \ -m PEM \ -t rsa \ -b 4096 \ -C "user@server.example.com" \ -f ~/.ssh/mykeys/privatekey \ -N passphrase Parameters: -m PEM = format key as PEM -t RSA = type of the key, RSA format -b 4096 = number of bits in the key, 4096 bits -C “ user@server.
